Greymane.name: Gilnean Cocktail
Greymane.description: Hurl a flask that deals 59 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 236 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone behind them.  Worgen: Razor Swipe  Swipe forward and damage enemies you pass through.

Greymane.name: Inner Beast
Greymane.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration, and reduce the cooldown of Inner Beast by 0.5 seconds.

Greymane.name: Darkflight
Greymane.description: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing 88 (+4% per level) damage.  Worgen: Disengage  Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.

Greymane.name: Go for the Throat
Greymane.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

Greymane.name: Cursed Bullet
Greymane.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.

Greymane.name: Curse of the Worgen
Greymane.description: Use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen.  While Human, your Basic Attack is ranged.  While Worgen, your Basic Attack is melee but deals 40% more damage and gain 10 Armor, taking 10% less damage.

GreymaneWorgen.name: Razor Swipe
GreymaneWorgen.description: Swipe towards the area in front of you for 135 (+4% per level) damage.  Human: Gilnean Cocktail  Damage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them.

GreymaneWorgen.name: Disengage
GreymaneWorgen.description: Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.  Human: Darkflight  Leap at an enemy and shapeshift into a Worgen.

1.name: Perfect Aim
1.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range by 30% and refunds 50 Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.

1.name: Viciousness
1.description: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

1.name: Wolfheart
1.description: Increase the cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks during Inner Beast from 0.5 to 1 second.

4.name: Draught Overflow
4.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's explosion length by 35%.

4.name: Insatiable
4.description: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore 10 Mana.

4.name: Thick Skin
4.description: Using Darkflight grants 50 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks while in Worgen Form, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

7.name: Incendiary Elixir
7.description: Quest: Every time Greymane hits an enemy Hero with the explosion damage from Gilnean Cocktail, increase its explosion damage by 15, up to 225. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, the cooldown is also reduced by 4 seconds.

7.name: Quicksilver Bullets
7.description: Increases Greymane's Human Basic Attack range by 1.1.

7.name: Wizened Duelist
7.description: Quest: Hero takedowns increase Basic Attack damage by 3%, up to 30%. This bonus is lost on death.

10.name: Cursed Bullet
10.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.

10.name: Go for the Throat
10.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

13.name: On the Prowl
13.description: Inner Beast increases Movement Speed by 30% once it has been active for 3 seconds.

13.name: Running Wild
13.description: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%.

13.name: Unfettered Assault
13.description: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%.

13.name: Visceral Attacks
13.description: Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1 second.

16.name: Alpha Killer
16.description: Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

16.name: Eager Wolf
16.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Inner Beast by an additional 40% after it has been active for 4 seconds.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

20.name: Gilnean Roulette
20.description: Cursed Bullet now hits all enemy heroes in its path and has its cooldown reduced by 5 seconds per hit.

20.name: Hunter's Blunderbuss
20.description: Human Basic Attacks splash for 100% damage behind the target.

20.name: Tooth and Claw
20.description: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage.

20.name: Unleashed
20.description: If the free cast of Go for the Throat kills its target, another free cast is provided that deals 35% more damage, up to 140%.
